text: Leigh Verstraete (born January 6, 1962) is a former professional ice hockey player who played eight games in the National Hockey League. He played with the Toronto Maple Leafs. ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Billings Bighorns players Category:Calgary Wranglers players Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Calgary Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: Leigh Verstraete
